subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jacques Lemaire is expected to finish the season as coach after the Devils fired the first-year coach John MacLean. It is Lemaire’s third stint as the Devils’ coach.
snippet: Jacques Lemaire is expected to finish the season as coach after the Devils fired the first-year coach John MacLean. It is Lemaire’s third stint as the Devils’ coach.
